author: Aiden Thompson-Woods
comment: Well constructed quit smoking aid. Simple yet good looking and easy to work with user interface. I've only tried 2 of these apps but this one was so good I didn't need to search any longer. Only just started my quitting journey, and I think with this apps aid I can stay on track and finally kick this terrible habit. Big thanks to the developers for making such a quality app.

author: mervin oh
comment: Cut down my stix. Not bad! Tried a few free ones, this one fits what I need - Set targets, easy to use, graphs, cost, savings, no intrusive ads (have ads), manual recording. BUT, will prefer motivation & health notification prompts. Can't ask for more actually from a free app considering I spend real money on smokes. Would gladly pay $0.99+ to support better development.

I really like this app. The thought of quitting at cold turkey gives me anxiety given our demanding lifestyles.    This app is really helping me reduce consumption by letting me know when it's OK to smoke. I find other healthy pleasures (a video game, a walk to a smoothie shop, comfort food, exercise, tea and nap, etc) during the window in which im not to smoke.    Simple to use.

author: Shawn McNair
comment: Simplest most efective incremental stop smoking app. Not full of ADD adds yet worthy of a price$. I had something similar in my reminders but it wasn't weaning me to lower nic consumtion. 30yrs + 40 a day has me in danger mode.

This is by far the best app I have used. It is exactly what I needed to regulate and keep myself from bored smoking. The notification can be annoying for some people, I'm not too bothered by it but I did go ahead and turn it off under the settings so I wouldn't feel urged.

author: Dian Utomo
comment: This app really help me cut down my bad habit. I just wish it have more log, or chart, or more detail stat to see my past day in how many cigarette that I burned, or how many hours from one cigarette to another. But so far, this app truly helpful if you want to cut down your cigarettes intake daily. Update: I try this app again because I'm starting with my smoking habit again. But after the latest update, I dont like how the app work.

author: Nellie-Jane Grernberg
comment: I have been looking for an app on google play which would gradually reduce my smoking. And I have finally found it. Might re rate it in 45 days but am happy I no longer need to carry two phones.  Would be nice to have option to get rid of the ads. Don't mind paying but the ads are annoying

author: Joy Mercurio
comment: Love this app! I'm only a few days in and I have definitely cheated. This app will hold me accountable WHICH I NEED AND I LOVE! Honestly, I downloaded like 3 apps at the same time and this one is the one that I've stuck with and liked the most. I see more happening with this one. Thank you so much devs!

author: monika blackman
comment: Would be good to set end time. I'm often up after midnight, so would be good if it allowed me to set finish of day rather than adding them to tomorrow's tally.  Widget doesn't update properly

author: Penny Hock
comment: Very basic. Some of the features don't seem to work (tips) I primarily am using it for the count down feature as all the other apps I found were for once you stopped smoking or went cold turkey.

author: ianardo davinci
comment: This app helped me cut down my cigs to just 3 per day, then I just stopped. No other app comes close to having such a positive impact on my life and health. I highly recommend this app if you want to stop smoking. The writers have earned a lifetime of my gratitude and respect. Thank you!

author: Tasha Nunn
comment: Well this app got me down to 4 a day (from about 12) it worked really well until it got down to 3 a day. It put way to much space between cigarettes to quickly. It needs to learn more. (like automatically adjust to you personally) I've started over 3 times now. I have to start over again tomorrow.

author: F. A. MURPHY
comment: This app is great, but sometimes I smoke half of a cigarette and may smoke it anywhere from 30 minutes to an hour later.  I have yet to find a non-smoking app for this type of use.  So, if I smoke half of a cigarette, should it be documented as if I've smoked a whole one?  Confused.

author: Ahmet Çakır
comment: It's a good app, sometimes hard to find what you are looking for but its good. However the problem for me is the day cycle of application. If your sleep cycles are the same everyday you're ok. Each time you don't smoke when you suppose to (let's say you're sleeping), the cycle stops and in the middle of the next day, this app says you're done for the day. Then you say "ship, i just woke up" and then you keep smoking like crazy. So this app was not helpful for me.

author: Binu Benjamin
comment: great app. if you want to quit this is the app for you that works. it will kill your habitual smoke and focus on withdrawal by lowering nicotine from your body. a heavy addict like me smoking for 15 years I see its been working for past 45 days.

author: David Shain
comment: As much as I dont like ads in apps, I can understand having them. What I cant understand is having 8 ads on a single page, and bogging down my phones memory loading them.

author: PflugerBird Johnson
comment: Exactly what i was looking for. Program works perfectly. I haven't finished yet but I've reduced from 2 packs per day to less than 1 per day. Little to no unpleasant side effects. Follow the plan and you'll be well on your way to completely stopping.

author: Tanysse MacLeod
comment: Best app we found to help quit. No stress and easy to use. Already down 1/4 of what I used to smoke and we're on day 5. I've already told others about this app too. Keep up the good work.

author: Jennifer Bailey
comment: I like this app a lot. I can't seem to download or read the tips and it'd be great if I could edit the time stamp on past entries. It would be cool if the tips could be pinned. I really like pinning motivators with pictures. I would pay for an ad free version.

author: Tyler Stalbaum
comment: This app is better than other stop smoking apps. I have a few things I'd like to see added like changing perimeters for a day considering I work overnight. Also adding an option for half cigarettes would be helpful.

author: Cearea Price
comment: It is simple to set up and use. I've tried others and they don't compare to this one. I have used it for 3 days and I'm already down 10 cigarettes a day. I used to smoke 2 pks a day. I have smoked for 38 yrs. This may be the only way for me to quit.

author: Tiffany Hendrix
comment: Honestly I love this app! It's helped me cut down a ton and hopefully wit smoking all together.  It's the only app I've found that tracks what you smoke and doesn't give you hell about it.  It's the only stop smoking app I'll use!

author: Deborah Gillespie
comment: I find this app to be the best by far. I tried 7 or so before this one. Easy to use and the red to green hand screen makes it game like. Plus us have the hand mind routine replacing the hand to mouth with a cig. Definitely highly recommend this. G

author: ashley Johnson
comment: Is great until it sends a notification REMINDING you to smoke!! If I'm trying to quit don't remind me that I haven't smoked in an hour! Let me login and see that I can smoke don't send a notification telling me too....

author: Lenora Bruce
comment: This app is great! I've told tons of friends, even strangers, about it. I had to start over a couple times just because I didn't have the will power to stick to it, but that's not this app's fault!

author: Nikki Havens
comment: This works!  First I reduced it from 1.5 packs day to .5 a day and stayed there for a few months. When I was a 100% committed to stop smoking, I did a slow 14 day taper. I have been smoke free as of October 18th, 2017.

author: Kristy Boo
comment: I'm 22 years old and I can barely breath. I have been a smoker for 10 the years now. Cold Turkey does not work for me. This app is perfect. It's the best one that I found !

author: Fifi Larue
comment: So far has been very helpful in my attempt to quit smoking, keeps me accountable. Can't save tips though which would be nice. Otherwise overall satisfied thus far.

author: Megan Foster
comment: Like it a lot. It's cut me back by half in two days just because it's holding me accountable.  Just wish there was a more convenient way to edit time smoked for when you forget to record it immediately.

author: Jaclyn Hanus
comment: Works great to help cut back on smoking and set goals. There is one minor flaw in the timing, if u frequently stay awake past midnight, the counter resets. What this means is that if you have a cigarette at 11:55 p.m. then when the time resets at midnight , it allows you to have a cigarette again at 12:01 a.m.  very minor but other than that this app works wonders and has helped me cut back from 25 cigarettes a day down to 13 cigarettes in a little over a month and I don't feel pressured or any withdrawal symptoms.

author: Vicky Farwaha
comment: This is a great app !!! ...... A smoker like me who has been smoking since 1996 says this.   It incredibly teaches your inner heart how to ignore the cravings. And according to me, it will work for me definitely.   I recommend all the wanna be nicotine quitters to give this app a first try.

author: Michelle Schutte
comment: I showed this app to my doctor and she is going to recommend it to all of her patients that smoke. She was very impressed by it. It sure has helped me out a lot by making me learn to go without a cigarette in small doses instead of going cold turkey. It will help you, but you have to want to quit and follow the rules...no cheating!

author: Chris Rouxel
comment: Needs to add daily overview from the beginning.  Needs to log cravings as well.  Needs to calculate new based on sleep pattern, not simply 12am. Needs a better widget for one touch add on Android.

author: Tracey MacPherson
comment: Simple, easy to use and very clear red/green smoking indicator. I just set my goals, and this app does the rest. Super easy and so far very effective.  I love it! One tiny change I'd like to see, would be having the numbers in the daily history section be red or green (instead of gray) so I can visually see whether or not I'm having a cigarette outside of the set perimeters.

author: Rebecca Green
comment: Would be great if I could set my daily hours instead of default 12 to 12. Also being able to denote whether it was a whole or half cigarette to keep better track of how many were actually smoked. Otherwise a decent app.

author: Stipe Čirko
comment: Great app to keep you away from chain smoking and basically reseting your smoking habit to longer and longer interval. But its not as easy as it seems, you will need a few days to build up a habit of checking if you are allowed to smoke.

author: jordan de sousa
comment: Good app but it doesn't take into account your active time it just divides 24 hours so if your supposed to smoke only 23 you will actually be at 18 if you follow the timer

author: Hope Keene
comment: I smoke alot and its just about will power.. Now when comes to sleep I like it cause tells me last smoke til I smoke another.I check it before I smoke after I sleep to know also how much sleep I'm getting too:-)still working on quitting but love it, this time ising it has too many ads

author: Rob Carolus
comment: Great app if you stick with it and follow the rules. I cut back from a pack and a half a day to about 7 or 8 cigarettes a day!

author: cathy crowley
comment: Best way to stop smoking. Tried everything and failed. So far so good. Gets you thinking before you light up.
